actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the American Battle Monuments Commission to assume control of overseas war memorials erected by private persons and non-Federal agencies and to demolish such war memorials in certain instances.

summary.text: Authorizes the American Battle Monuments Commission to assume control of overseas war memorials erected by private persons, States, private associations, and non-Federal agencies. Authorizes the demolition of such war memorials in specified instances.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the American Battle Monuments Commission to assume control of overseas war memorials erected by private persons and non-Federal agencies and to demolish such war memorials in certain instances.
